document.heading: National Popular Vote Interstate Agreement Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-274, the “National Popular Vote Interstate Agreement Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-558, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 13, 2010, and September 21, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 12, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-558 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-274 became effective on December 7, 2010.
